inclusion.criterion: received BCG in the first month of life as schedule
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: without history of exposure of tuberculosis

exclusion.criterion: PPD size in the range of 1st 2.5 percentile or having a positive ELISPOT result at the time of enrollment
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: will be closely followed up for clinical symptoms and signs of TB and necessary diagnostic workup will be done

exclusion.criterion: LTBI is highly suspected, prophylaxis will be initiated.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Closed contact families and care-givers will be asked to take CXR for excluding active pulmonary TB.
exclusion.label: triggers
